ygData.msgSnippet: Radistor doesn t see it coming and half of his leg id blasted off by the grenade. Radistor fell to the ground, not able to get back up. Radistor changes back

Radistor doesn't see it coming and half of his leg id blasted off by the
grenade. Radistor fell to the ground, not able to get back up. Radistor
changes back into the Radicons and Train Wreck is badly hurt. Stronghold
slings him over his shoulder and continues to run...
----- Original Message -----
From: <TrikeJacob@...>

Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 9:41 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> Triceradon hears all the comotion and decides to check it out.  He sees
Radistor fireing at all the Maximals.  He takes out his gernade launcher and
begins firing back at Radistor.
